name: Rime Worm Grub
speed: 30 ft., swim 30 ft, burrow (snow, ice) 20 ft.

trait.name: Born of Rime
text: A rime worm grub can breathe air or water with equal ease.

trait.name: Ravenous
text: At the grub stage, the worm is painfully hungry. Rime worm grubs can make opportunity attacks against enemies who disengage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The rime worm makes one tendril attack and one gnash attack.

action.name: Tendril
text: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Gnash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
